text: Nia dama daane dogoono a Jeduthun go Gedaliah, Zeri, Jeshaiah, Shimei, Hashabiah, mo Mattithiah. Digaula e ngalua i lala nia helekai di nadau damana e hagadele gi hongo tenua nia helekai haga iloo mai baahi Dimaadua, ngaadahi mo di daahili i nadau ‘harp’, mo di daahili hagaamu mo di mee bolo mee ang gi Dimaadua.
